org.ow2.chameleon.core.services

Interface Watcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectoryMonitor

    public interface Watcher
    A service letting adding / removing directory watchers.
    Since:
    1.0.4
    Version:
    $Id: 1.0.4 $Id
    Author:
    The OW2 Chameleon Team

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(File directory, boolean watch)
      Adds a directory to the watcher.
      boolean add(File directory, long polling)
      Adds a directory to the watcher.
      boolean removeAndStopIfNeeded(File directory)
      If the directory was added, remove it.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        boolean add(File directory,
          boolean watch)
        Adds a directory to the watcher. If `watch` is true, the directory is monitored, otherwise only the initial provisioning is done.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory
        watch - true to enable the watch mode.
        Returns:
        true if the directory was added, false otherwise.

      • add

        boolean add(File directory,
          long polling)
        Adds a directory to the watcher. If `polling` is not -1, the directory is monitored, otherwise only the initial provisioning is done.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory
        polling - the polling period in ms, -1 to disable the watch.
        Returns:
        true if the directory was added, false otherwise.

      • removeAndStopIfNeeded

        boolean removeAndStopIfNeeded(File directory)
        If the directory was added, remove it. It the monitoring was enable it disable the monitoring. You have to call stop on all directories where the add methods have returned true.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory
        Returns:
        true if the directory was watched and stopped.
